front.title: Requirements for XML Messaging Version 1.0 Release 00

abstract.t: This specification contains requirements for a generic approach to the reliable, resilient, secure, tamper resistant, authenticated exchange of XML or other electronic documents over insecure transport mechanisms. The specification provides the requirements and framework for a set of related specifications on XML Messaging covering: o Requirements for XML Messaging (this paper) o Common XML Message Elements o Document Exchange and Transactions o Reliable Messaging o Secure Messaging o Document Choreography Definitions o Common Document Exchanges o Transport Protocol Supplements Although much work has been carried out on the other parts of the XML Messaging specification described above, they are sill in development
